settings.recipe_description: Our signature festive cocktail sweetened with organic wildflower honey
settings.recipe_ingredients:
• 2 oz Spirited Hive Vodka Cranberry
  • Ice cubes
  • Fresh cranberries for garnish
  • Lime wedge (optional)
  • Rosemary sprig for festive garnish (optional)
settings.recipe_instructions:
1. Fill a highball glass with ice
  2. Pour Spirited Hive Vodka Cranberry over ice
  3. Garnish with fresh cranberries
  4. Add lime wedge and rosemary sprig for extra holiday flair
  5. Serve immediately and enjoy!
